introduction_english: The word we'll be diving into in this section is かせぐ, a term you'll commonly encounter in discussions about work, finances, and ways of earning a living. Get ready to enrich your vocabulary and sound more fluent!
meaning_explanation_english: The word かせぐ means to earn or to make money. It often implies working diligently to obtain income.

common_words: 出稼ぎ: working away from home

kanji_explanation: This word is usually written in kana, so there are no kanji to explain.
synonyms: 得る-1 : える : to get
儲ける : もうける : to profit
synonym_explanation: The most common synonyms of the word かせぐ are 得る and 儲ける. While える can mean to obtain in a broader context beyond just financial gains, もうける specifically refers to making a profit. Each conveys a slightly different nuance of how one benefits or gains.
antonyms: 失う : うしなう : to lose
antonym_explanation: The most common antonyms of the word かせぐ are うしなう and ろうひする. While うしなう means to lose something, ろうひする refers to wasting resources or money, showing the opposite actions to making or earning.

collocations.kanji: じゅうじかんかけてかせぐ
collocations.furigana: じゅうじかんかけてかせぐ

example_sentences.kanji: 彼はたくさんのお金を稼いでいます。
example_sentences.furigana: 彼(かれ)はたくさんのお金(かね)を稼(かせ)いでいます。

translations.EN: He is earning a lot of money.
translations.VI: Anh ấy đang kiếm được rất nhiều tiền.
translations.MY: သူဟာအများကြီးပိုက်ဆံရှာနေလျက်ရှိသည်။
translations.HI: वह बहुत सारा पैसा कमा रहे हैं।
translations.FA: او دارد پول زیادی به دست می‌آورد.

example_sentences.furigana: 彼(かれ)は働(はたら)いて稼(かせ)ぐ。

translations.VI: Anh ấy làm việc để kiếm tiền.
translations.FR: Il travaille pour gagner de l'argent.
translations.BN: সে টাকা রোজগারের জন্য কাজ করে।
translations.MY: သူသည်ဝင်ငွေရရန်အလုပ်လုပ်သည်။
translations.HI: वह पैसा कमाने के लिए काम करता है।
translations.FA: او کار می‌کند تا درآمد کسب کند.

example_sentences.furigana: 彼(かれ)は手(て)を使(つか)って稼(かせ)ぐ。

translations.EN: He earns a living using his hands.
translations.ID: Dia mencari nafkah dengan menggunakan tangannya.
translations.ES: Gana la vida usando sus manos.
translations.VI: Anh kiếm sống bằng tay của mình.
translations.FR: Il gagne sa vie en utilisant ses mains.
translations.NE: उ ले आफ्नो हातले पैसा कमाउँछ।
translations.BN: সে তার হাত দিয়ে টাকা উপার্জন করে।
translations.TL: Kumikita siya gamit ang kanyang mga kamay.
translations.MY: သူသည် သူ့လက်များကို အသုံးပြု၍ ဝင်ငွေရှာသည်။
translations.HI: वह अपने हाथों का उपयोग करके कमाता है।
translations.FA: او با استفاده از دستانش پول در می آورد.

example_sentences.kanji: 父は十時間かけてお金を稼ぐ。
example_sentences.furigana: 父(ちち)は十時間(じゅうじかん)かけてお金(おかね)を稼(かせ)ぐ。

translations.EN: My father earns money by working for ten hours.
translations.ID: Ayah saya mendapatkan uang dengan bekerja selama sepuluh jam.
translations.ES: Mi padre gana dinero trabajando durante diez horas.
translations.VI: Bố tôi kiếm tiền bằng cách làm việc mười giờ.
translations.FR: Mon père gagne de l'argent en travaillant dix heures.
translations.NE: मेरो बुवाले दस घण्टा काम गरेर पैसा कमाउनुहुन्छ।
translations.BN: আমার বাবা দশ ঘন্টা কাজ করে টাকা উপার্জন করেন。
translations.ZH: 我爸爸工作十个小时来赚钱。
translations.KO: 아버지는 열 시간 동안 일해서 돈을 벌어요.
translations.TL: Ang tatay ko ay kumikita ng pera sa pamamagitan ng pagtatrabaho ng sampung oras.
translations.MY: ဖခင်က ဆယ်နာရီလုပ်သားလုပ်ပြီးပိုက်ဆံရှာတာဖြစ်ပါတယ်။
translations.HI: मेरे पिता दस घंटे काम करके पैसे कमाते हैं।
translations.AR: والدي يكسب المال بالعمل لمدة عشر ساعات.
translations.FA: پدرم با ده ساعت کار پول به دست می‌آورد.

to work hard.MY: ဝင်ငွေနိုင်ရန် အလုပ်လုပ်သည်

parts_of_speech: Godan verb with 'gu' ending, Transitive verb
Godan verb with 'gu' ending, Transitive verb
Godan verb with 'gu' ending, Intransitive verb
